-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Adds XMLGenerator instance for RouteT monad
--   
@package web-routes-hsp
@version 0.24.6

module Web.Routes.XMLGenT
flattenCDATA :: [XML] -> [XML]
instance MonadRoute m => MonadRoute (XMLGenT m)
instance (Functor m, Monad m) => XMLGenerator (RouteT url m)
instance (Functor m, Monad m) => SetAttr (RouteT url m) XML
instance (Functor m, Monad m) => AppendChild (RouteT url m) XML
instance (Functor m, Monad m) => EmbedAsChild (RouteT url m) ()
instance (Functor m, Monad m) => EmbedAsChild (RouteT url m) XML
instance (Monad m, Functor m) => EmbedAsChild (RouteT url m) Text
instance (Monad m, Functor m) => EmbedAsChild (RouteT url m) Text
instance (Functor m, Monad m) => EmbedAsChild (RouteT url m) String
instance (Functor m, Monad m) => EmbedAsChild (RouteT url m) Char
instance (Functor m, Monad m) => EmbedAsAttr (RouteT url m) (Attr Text url)
instance (Monad m, Functor m, IsName n Text) => EmbedAsAttr (RouteT url m) (Attr n Text)
instance (Monad m, Functor m, IsName n Text) => EmbedAsAttr (RouteT url m) (Attr n Text)
instance (Functor m, Monad m) => EmbedAsAttr (RouteT url m) (Attr Text Integer)
instance (Functor m, Monad m) => EmbedAsAttr (RouteT url m) (Attr Text Int)
instance (Functor m, Monad m) => EmbedAsAttr (RouteT url m) (Attr Text Bool)
instance (Functor m, Monad m) => EmbedAsAttr (RouteT url m) (Attr String String)
instance (Functor m, Monad m) => EmbedAsAttr (RouteT url m) (Attr String Char)
instance (Functor m, Monad m) => EmbedAsAttr (RouteT url m) Attribute
instance (Functor m, Monad m) => XMLGen (RouteT url m)
